meta.title: Income Tax Filing Guide for Salaried Individuals in India (AY 2025-26)
meta.description: A step-by-step guide for salaried employees to file Income Tax Returns, choose the right ITR form, and maximize deductions.
meta.author: CA Neha Sharma

sections.content: Filing Income Tax Returns (ITR) is mandatory for salaried individuals whose income exceeds the basic exemption limit. Proper filing ensures compliance and faster refunds.

items: Those with foreign income or assets

sections.content: Timely filing of ITR not only avoids penalties but also strengthens your financial credibility.
